meanings.definition: A prediction of what will happen in the future.
meanings.sent1: The ancient book contained a prophecy about a great flood.
meanings.sent2: The prophecy foretold a time of peace and prosperity.
meanings.sent3: The prophecy that it would rain cats and dogs made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her prophecy of success shone like a beacon in the darkness of doubt.
meanings.sent5: The prophecy of the wise old owl echoed through the forest, guiding all who listened.

meanings.definition: A statement that something will happen in the future.
meanings.sent1: The prophecy of a new leader brought hope to the people.
meanings.sent2: His prophecy of an alien invasion was met with skepticism.
meanings.sent3: The prophecy that the moon would turn into cheese was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The prophecy of a golden age inspired generations to come.
meanings.sent5: The prophecy of the falling star left a trail of wonder in its wake.
